titleStmt.title: An epistle from Thomas Janney to Friends of Cheshire, and by them desired to be made publick.
titleStmt.author: Janney, Thomas, 1633?-1696.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle ...,

notesStmt.note: "From my house near the falls of Delaware in the county of Bucks in Pensylvania, the 16th day of the 10th. month, 1693."--p. 8.
Reproduction of original in the John Rylands University Library.
